name: v0.1.3
body:

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/domainr/epp/compare/v0.1.2...v0.1.3

name: v0.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Create a new xml.Decoder for every EPP data unit by @ydnar in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/48


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/domainr/epp/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

name: v0.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add support for Verisign's Namestore extension by @case in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/15
* Rip out hard-coded namestore subProduct info, instead requiring consumer code to provide it by @wbond in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/19
* Rightside premium earlyAccess fix by @cee-dub in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/21
* Support a phase attribute in the fee element by @cee-dub in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/23
* Pretty-print XML when debugging by @case in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/24
* Extname map by @case in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/25
* Add fee-0.11 for nic.kiwi by @case in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/26
* Return pointer-typed value for error by @cee-dub in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/27
* conn: add Timeout field; when set, enforce r/w deadlines by @cee-dub in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/28
* WIP: add fee-0.21 by @case in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/29
* Mangle fee-0.21 phase/subphase into Charges by @ydnar in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/31
* fee-0.11 extension support for Google Registry by @ydnar in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/32
* Parse EPP fee-0.11 <fee:fee> into Charges. by @ydnar in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/33
* Preserve login result for client usage (logging) by @philpennock in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/35
* CI: use swan image (Go 1.9.4) by @philpennock in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/36
* CircleCI: enable GitHub checks by @ydnar in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/38
* Fix function comments based on best practices from Effective Go by @CodeLingoTeam in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/39
* Upstream internal EPP fork changes by @ydnar in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/44
* Encode XML using separate bytes.Buffer instances by @ydnar in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/46
* Support concurrent access via mutex and worker goroutine by @ydnar in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/47

## New Contributors
* @case made their first contribution in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/15
* @philpennock made their first contribution in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/35
* @CodeLingoTeam made their first contribution in https://github.com/domainr/epp/pull/39

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/domainr/epp/commits/v0.1.0
